description:
Upward Mobility presents its Clinical Care Nurse Specialist (CCNS) Exam Prep app for Palm webOS.  This app contains 618 targeted questions covering the Adult, Pediatric, and Neonatal CCNS exams to allow you flexibility in preparation.  Each question is written exclusively for Upward Mobility by our independent team of expert nursing writers, and is paired with an explanatory answer to reinforce the practical knowledge you need for success.  Our content covers all clinical topics on the exam and focuses on the AACN Standards of Care for  for Acute and Critical Care Nursing.
  ||  
Upward Mobility is not affiliated with and this app is not endorsed by the AACN.
  ||  
Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
